drag_drop_hint: Drag a GameObject with MeshRenderer/SkinnedMeshRenderer here
object_field_tooltip: Specify a GameObject containing a MeshRenderer or SkinnedMeshRenderer.
use_baked_mesh_tooltip: Use baked mesh for better display/picking alignment. Useful for pose verification.
mode_tooltip: Default click behavior. Add adds islands, Remove removes them.
mode_add_tooltip: Add clicked UV island to selection.
mode_remove_tooltip: Remove clicked UV island from selection.
auto_work_copy_tooltip: Automatically create a work copy when setting the target mesh.
toggle_hotkey_tooltip: Press to toggle between Add/Remove mode.
uv_channel_tooltip: UV channel for analysis/preview (UV0..UV7). Auto-reanalyzes on change.
overlay_on_top_tooltip: Always draw wires/seams in front (Z-test disabled).
disable_aa_tooltip: Draw lines without AA (1px) in batch. Thickness only applies with AA enabled.
backface_cull_tooltip: Don't draw triangles facing away from camera (selection display only).
depth_offset_tooltip: Offset wires/seams along normals to prevent z-fighting (in mm).
selected_islands_color_tooltip: Wire color for selected islands in scene view.
seam_color_tooltip: Seam line color in scene view.
preview_fill_color_tooltip: Color for selected regions in preview (output PNG remains black/white).
overlay_alpha_tooltip: Opacity of fill overlay on base texture.
invert_tooltip: Select unselected islands and deselect selected ones.
preview_overlay_base_tooltip: Display semi-transparent mask overlay on the base texture.
show_island_preview: Show UV Island Boundaries in Preview
show_island_preview_tooltip: Draw UV island boundaries (seams) as lines on preview.
invert_mask_tooltip: Invert the generated union mask (black=fill). Independent from selection inversion.
pixel_margin_tooltip: Expand black mask regions by pixels to prevent bleeding at UV seams.
channel_write_tooltip: Write mask to specific RGBA channels. Supports PNG/vertex colors.
base_png_tooltip: PNG to overwrite. If not specified, creates new PNG.
base_vc_mesh_tooltip: Mesh to use as base for vertex color overwriting. Vertex count must match.
bake_to_vertex_colors_tooltip: Bake selection mask to vertex colors per channel and save as new mesh.
overwrite_existing_tooltip: Overwrite if mesh asset with same name exists. Otherwise saves with sequential number.
save_png_tooltip: Save UV mask as PNG based on current selection. If base PNG specified, overwrites selected channels.
help_usage:
Usage:
1) Set target and run 'Analyze UVs'.
2) Left-click to change selection based on current mode (Add/Remove).
3) Press hotkey [{0}] to toggle Add/Remove mode.
4) Use Invert / Select All / Clear as needed.
5) Configure Export settings and Save PNG.

save_inverted_too_tooltip: Save inverted mask alongside the normal mask (filename_inv.png).
output_settings_tooltip: File name, output folder, and other detailed settings
setup_work_copy_tooltip: Create a temporary static mesh copy to work on, avoiding deformation issues.
